= welcome guide =

In your first start up of atom, check or uncheck the box before:
show  welcome guide when opening atom

Note. In osx, it is uncheck when first open atom. After that, either do:

1.
How to make atom show the getting started guide at every startup 
https://discuss.atom.io/t/how-to-make-atom-show-the-getting-started-guide-at-every-startup/15125

You can put this in your ~/.atom/init.coffee:
atom.config.set 'welcome.showOnStartup', true

or 

2.
in atom, go to Atom > Config, change false to true

  welcome:
    showOnStartup: true
